talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Hermit's Totem$
(A weird object. It has a powerful aura but you don't know what it is for)

${user_nick}$
What?! Why am I mumbling in front of this piece of wood?
To learn techniques I should go and look for Master {user_class}.

${user_nick}$
Warrior skills can be learnt from Master Warrior Duncan and Archer skills can be learnt from Master Sorceress Deanna. And to learn Cleric or Sorceress skills one has to go to Mana Ridge. I had forgotten about that.

$Hermit's Totem$
(Hermit's Totem seems to have a mysterious aura)

${user_nick}$
Now I have to finish our tribe's mission alone. To do that I need to train myself and win the challenge against my own self. Teacher used to say that that is the way you can reach enlightenment at the new level

${user_nick}$
To check what I can do, I think I can press [ K ], or open the skill window by clicking the skill window shortcut icon on the left side of the minimap.

${user_nick}$
And what did teacher say?
Yes, the red skillbook mark is on skills that have usage limitations. Skill limitations should be able to be unlocked through the Hermit's Totem at each village.

${user_nick}$
Hmm, yes. This is the icon sign for skills that cannot be learnt yet.
It appears when my level is lower than the skill attainment level, I lack skill points (SP), or the prerequisite skill conditions are not satisfied.

${user_nick}$
This is a sacred guardian totem that I used to see at our hermit tribe village. Teacher used to say that it worked as a bridge between us and the spirit of our ancestors. She also said that we could gain knowledge from it.
